author: Freddie
title: Fantastic looking box, but contains only basic bricks
review:
As the title suggests, the box looks fantastic. At first glance also something that would justify what I consider a somewhat steep price. If you collect boxes, I guess you'll love this set. If you just throw them away, but collect rare pieces, the only interest in this set is the golden, as in a tan with sprayed-on, chrome-gold paint, 2x4-brick. It does look fantastic though, even if wear is a concern regarding the paint.

Other than that there's just the regular bunch of bricks you'll find in every bucket and brick-box out there today.

author: AT_AT_Driver
title: A Must-Have
review:
• good price, many bricks
  • golden brick as a treasure
  • very good box design, more nostalgic pics on rear side
  • nice new colours (light green, light blue)

good present (even for girls), 50 years anniversary set of your favourite toy
